entry.title: Disposing of "dust attack" UTXOs
entry.summary: The email contains information about a tool developed by the sender for parsing utxodump data, which is available on GitHub. The tool, which can be found at [this link](https://github.com/bubb1es71/dusts), has already produced some preliminary results. These findings are hoped to stimulate interest and discussion within the relevant community. Additionally, the email includes an image that likely presents data or results related to the tool's output or functionality, although the specifics of the image content are not described in the text. This development could be significant for those interested in analyzing utxodump data, offering new insights or efficiencies in processing such information.
